description:
With a comprehensive personal injury practice, our team at Malloy Law Offices, LLC, has returned more than $46 million to clients. We serve Bethesda, Maryland, and the surrounding areas in matters such as the following:

  • Medical malpractice: Birth injury, failure to diagnose and defective medical devices
  • Motor vehicle accidents: Bus, truck, car and motorcycle accidents
  • Workplace incidents: Brain injuries, spinal injuries and construction accidents
  • Nursing home abuse and wrongful death

Understandably, going through a catastrophic incident can leave people feeling hopeless about the future. We make it a priority to give clients of our law firm peace of mind. From the free initial consultation to the resolution of a case, we are committed to responding to our clients' concerns and explaining their options. Additionally, we only collect a fee if we win the case. Our attorneys take on all the legal work so the people we represent can remain solely focused on recovering.

Aside from our notable verdicts and settlements, we have also earned prestige through the honors our attorneys have received, such as being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100, selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers, listed in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best, and named in Lawyers of Distinction.

Malloy Law Offices, LLC, offers virtual appointments. We also accommodate our clients through providing services in English, Spanish and Russian.
